title: Freelo.GG-Improving You
body:
Want to know where your at in ranked?

want to know where you can improve in your play?

well wonder no more boys and girls.

* See stats based on role
* Compare against friends
* See stats based on champion
* More modes available? Which?
* Fix something that is broken? Make it faster?
* Something else?

http://freelo.gg/

Enjoy!

replies.body:
Useless site - two generic slabs of text based on some bs number system on last few games that it registers. It doesn't even register my latest games and skips some entirely.

Shoddy back end work, GG noob site.

Its only records ranked games, normals are considered practice and not worth much.
it has recorded all 24 of your ranked games. and thats all you have in your history.. even other sites can confirm this.


Thanks for your feedback tho, abit rough, but i'll take it.


Maybe you have something positive to contribute? something you would like to see?

Damn, that is a good site.

Instead of just showing your 'Best and Worst" - it should show everything, like - what is my 2nd best, second worst. I think this is a great tool and will be adding it to bookmarks.

Nice site, looking forward to seeing it evolve.

Would be good to have an overall view of your stats, rather than just your best and worst, maybe even a breakdown by champ/role would be cool.

Great work.

(No offence) but there are better websites than Freelo.gg such as:
lolking.com
oce.op.gg
Those are the websites i use

none taken

lolking and opgg work in a different fashion to this website

this site is designed to give you an idea of how well your doing in certain areas of your gameplay and where you need to improve.

or is it that maybe you don't like the idea that a website will tell you what you don't want to hear.

that you play like a bronze and need to improve?

Idm wat people say, i do the best to my own ability.
But the thing about the site u've provided is that it only shows matches from ranked, and nothing else, so that's why i like lolking and opgg is better for me alone.

Normals are casual or considered practice.


The choice is yours, which ever site you use

wouldn't mind seeing the average stats per tier for a certain champion. e.g. - for gold tier the average first dragon time amongst all the other stats. Though I'm not sure how you'd do that for varying gamelengths.
Didn't really tell me how to get freelo doe ;_;.

really nice site other than the homepage looks similar to oce.op.gg's
http://gyazo.com/4deb83363c71a01ed4a8a774af88c352
But how can I improve my assists if I do all the damage?
